dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: This is a Python implementation of the WHATWG Encoding standard.
dependencies.name: py-webencodings

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
The Astropy Project is a community effort to develop a single core
package for Astronomy in Python and foster interoperability between
Python astronomy packages.
dependent_to.name: py-astropy

dependent_to.description:
Beautiful Soup is a Python library for pulling data out of HTML and XML
files. It works with your favorite parser to provide idiomatic ways of
navigating, searching, and modifying the parse tree.
dependent_to.name: py-beautifulsoup4

dependent_to.description: Fixes Unicode that's broken in various ways.
dependent_to.name: py-ftfy

dependent_to.description:
lxml is the most feature-rich and easy-to-use library for processing XML
and HTML in the Python language.
dependent_to.name: py-lxml

dependent_to.description: Python dependency management and packaging made easy.
dependent_to.name: py-poetry

dependent_to.description: Python Cortical mapping software for fMRI data.
dependent_to.name: py-pycortex

dependent_to.description: Box of handy tools for Sphinx.
dependent_to.name: py-sphinx-toolbox

description: HTML parser based on the WHATWG HTML specification.
name: py-html5lib

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
